info.author: Baptiste Fontaine
info.description:
Summarify takes a URL and parses its HTML to give you a title and description,
but also a picture URL, and a couple other attributes to summarize the page.

info.name: summarify
info.summary: Get title and description from a Web page
info.html_description: Summarify takes a URL and parses its HTML to give you a title and description, but also a picture URL, and a couple other attributes to summarize the page.
